name: Battleship Pew Pew
description:
The war started! You are the commander of the Battleship  Pew Pew  and need to destroy the waves of enemies who want to destroy the planetary shield of your world! To each destroyed enemy the chance of the galactic alliance survive increases. But be careful! Every living enemy, the planetary shield of their home world is weakened!

Battleship Pew Pew is a shooter with a retro look similar to the old Atari 2600 games. In this demo to be played in the browser, there are  four game levels. Our complete game has infinite phases, more than 10 different enemies, power ups and a series of small surprises.  This game is the first of our future pack, called Atari Dream.

Those who buy the full version will receive in addition to the game, the following pdf files:

- An exclusive poster
- Manual in the style Atari 2600

How to play
- "S" or "F2" starts the game
- Left and right arrows
- Spacebar to shoot

Released version supports Gamepad and keyboard! Mac version are on the way!

Have fun!
